name: Afloat
storyline: You have crashlanded in the jungle, and somehow you awake on a raft, with only a grappling gun and a tablet with building blueprints beside you. Using your survival skills, you have try to make your way back to society. Luckily for you, the river that you are following is full of useful resources, that can help you in this endeavour.
summary: Have you ever thought about what would happen to you, if you would crashland in the jungle? What if, you had to gather your water and food by yourself, what if you had to make your way back to society? In Afloat, you can use virtual reality, and see if you've got what it takes to survive.
